Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Mnzake adzanena kuti, “Ambuye wathu! Ine sindidamuuze kuti aziswa malamulo ayi koma iye adadzisocheretsa yekha.”
Mulungu adzati, “Musakangane pamaso panga. Ine ndidakutumizirani chenjezo lokwanira.”
Chilango sichisintha ayi ndipo Ine sindionetsa chinyengo kwa akapolo anga
Patsiku limene Ife tidzaifunsa Gahena kuti, “Kodi mwadzadza?” Ndipo iyo idzati, “Kodi akanalipobe ena?”
Ndipo Paradiso idzabweretsedwa kufupi kwa anthu olungama
Ichi ndicho chimene mudalonjezedwa ndipo ndi mphotho kwa iye amene amadzipereka kwa Mulungu nthawi zonse nasunga malamulo ake
Ndiponso kwa iye amene amaopa Mwini chisoni chosatha wosaoneka ndipo amadza kwa Iye ndi mtima wodzichepetsa
Lowani m’menemo mwamtendere ndi mosaopa ayi. Ili ndi tsiku la moyo wosatha
M’menemo mudzakhala chilichonse chimene iwo adzafuna ndipo Ife tili ndi zinthu zambiri
Kodi ndi mibadwo ingati imene Ife tidaiononga iwo asanabadwe amene adali ndi mphamvu zoposa iwo ndipo iwo adafuna chitetezo padziko? Kodi iwo anali ndi kwina kothawira
Ndithudi muli chikumbutso mu zimenezi kwa iye amene ali ndi mtima kapena amatchera khutu pamene achenjezedwa
Ndithudi Ife tidalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndi zonse zimene zili m’menemo m’masiku asanu ndi limodzi ndipo sitidatope ayi
Kotero pirira pa zonse zimene amanena ndipo lemekeza Ambuye wako dzuwa lisanatuluke ndiponso lisanalowe
Ndipo mulemekeze Iye usiku ndipo utatha kupemphera
Ndipo udzamve patsiku limene woitana adzaitana kuchokera pafupi
Tsiku limene iwo adzamva kulira kwa mfuwu woona. Limeneli lidzakhala tsiku louka kwa akufa
Ndithudi ndife amene timapereka moyo ndi imfa ndipo ndi kwa Ife kumene zonse zidzabwerera
Tsiku limene dziko lidzang’ambika ndipo iwo adzatuluka mofulumira. Kumeneko ndiko kudzakhala kusonkhanitsidwa pamodzi
Ife timadziwa zonse zimene amanena ndipo iwe si ndiwe wankhanza ayi. Koma muchenjeze ndi Korani kwa aliyense amene aopa chilango changa
Pali mphepo imene imamwaza fumbi
Ndi mitambo imene ili yolemedwa ndi madzi
Ndi zombo zimene zimayenda mosavutika ndi mwabata
Ndipo pali iwo amene amagawa madalitso ndi chilolezo chathu
Ndithudi chimene mwalonjezedwa, ndithudi, ndi choona
Ndithudi chiweruzo chidzakwaniritsidwa
Pali kumwamba kumene kuli njira zambiri
Ndithudi inu muli ndi maganizo osiyana
Amene abwezedwa ku icho ndiye amene wabwezedwa
wotembereredwa akhale amene amanama
Amene akutidwa ndi kusamvera
Iwo amafunsa kuti, “Kodi tsiku lachiweruzo lidzadza liti?”
Tsiku limene iwo adzaweruzidwa ndi kuponyedwa ku Zariat	559 moto
Lawani chilango chanu! Ichi ndicho chimene munali kufuna kuti chidze msanga
Ndithudi iwo amene amalewa machimo adzakhala m’minda imene ili ndi a kasupe
Kulandira zimene Ambuye wawo awapatsa. Ndithudi kale iwo anali kuchita zinthu zabwino
Iwo anali kugona nthawi yochepa usiku
Ndipo m’bandakucha anali kupempha chikhululukiro
Ndipo mu chuma chawo mudali gawo limene linali kuperekedwa kwa anthu opempha ndi osowa
Ndipo m’dziko muli zizindikiro kwa iwo okhulupirira
Ndi mizimu yanu kodi simungaone
Ndipo kumwamba ndiko kuli chakudya chanu ndi zimene muli kulonjezedwa
Ndiye, pali Ambuye wakumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, chimenechi ndi cholinga ndi choonadi chomwe inu mumayankhula
Kodi udamva nkhani ya alendo olemekezeka a Abrahamu
Pamene iwo adadza kwa iye, iwo adati, “Mtendere.” Ndipo iye adati, “Mtendere.” Ndipo iye adati, “Inu ndinu alendo kwa ine.”
Ndipo iye atapita ku banja lake adabweretsa nyama ya ng’ombe yowotcha
Motero iye adadza nayo kwa iwo nati, “Kodi simufuna kudya?”
Motero iye adayamba kuchita mantha mu mtima mwake. Ndipo iwo adati, “Usaope.” Ndipo iwo adamuuza nkhani yabwino yakubadwa kwa mwana wamwamuna yemwe adzakhala wanzeru kwambiri
Ndipo mkazi wake adadza modzichepetsa ndipo adamenya pa mphumi pake nati, “Nkhalamba yaikazi yosaberekapo!”
Iwo adati, “Ngakhale ndi choncho, Ambuye wako wayankhula. Iye ndi wodzala ndi luntha ndiponso nzeru.”
